com.redhat.rhn.frontend.action.renderers

Class BaseFragmentRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.action.renderers.BaseFragmentRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FragmentRenderer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CriticalSystemsRenderer, ImagesRenderer, InactiveSystemsRenderer, LatestErrataRenderer, PendingActionsRenderer, RecentSystemsRenderer, SystemGroupsRenderer, TasksRenderer

    public abstract class BaseFragmentRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements FragmentRenderer
    Simple implementation of a fragment renderer which automates the boilerplate work done rendering a fragment
